sentences.en: The meeting produced the usual bromides about macroeconomic policy, third-world debt and the environment.
sentences.cn: 会议上提出的还是那些老掉了牙的话题：宏观经济政策、第三世界债务和环境问题。

sentences.en: There were even claims that IT had improved the performance of the service sector significantly, although macroeconomic measures of productivity did not reflect the improvement.
sentences.cn: 甚至有人声称，它大大改善了服务部门的业绩，尽管生产率的宏观经济措施没有反映出这种改善。
我们必须重新调整宏观经济政策。
